_header: I do you to witting without fail
_description: The spiritual battle — one couplet translating, ‘Ortum est bellum satis durum…’ in a Latin sermon (?Bromyard), de passione domini vel In Ramispalmarum

CULKk424.Transcription:
Y do ȝow to wytynge with owte fayleþer ys by gun a gret
                    batayle
